channel.title: CVE Feed for Martem -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Martem -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-10605|2024-09-17T00:30:58.741Z -- martem -- telem-gw6%2Fgwm
item.description: Martem TELEM GW6/GWM versions prior to 2.0.87-4018403-k4 may allow unprivileged users to modify/upload a new system configuration or take the full control over the RTU using default credentials to connect to the RTU.

item.title: CVE-2018-10603|2024-09-17T00:21:23.117Z -- martem -- telem%20gw6
item.description: Martem TELEM GW6 and GWM devices with firmware 2018.04.18-linux_4-01-601cb47 and prior do not perform authentication of IEC-104 control commands, which may allow a rogue node a remote control of the industrial process.
